name: Peak Patrol Song
description: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.
bonus: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent: DEF increases by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% and gain a 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% All Elemental DMG Bonus for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once per 0.1s. When this effect reaches 2 stacks or the 2nd stack's duration is refreshed, increase all nearby party members' All Elemental DMG Bonus by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% for every 1,000 DEF the equipping character has, up to a maximum of 25.6%/32%/38.4%/44.8%/51.2%, for 15s.
